description: This file defines API routes for managing staff entities in a school management system. It includes CRUD operations such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, patching, and deleting staff records, utilizing FastAPI and SQLAlchemy.

methods.name: list_staff( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )
methods.description: Lists staff members with optional pagination.

methods.name: get_staff(staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific staff member by ID.

methods.name: update_staff( staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StaffUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Updates an existing staff record entirely.

methods.name: patch_staff( staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StaffUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
delete_staff(staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: create_staff
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_staff(payload: StaffCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: delete_staff
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_staff(staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_staff
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_staff(staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_staff
ctags.signature: ( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )

ctags.name: patch_staff
ctags.signature: ( staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StaffUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: update_staff
ctags.signature: ( staff_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: StaffUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
